name: Multiblock Cheatsheet
subtitle: The Great Cheats on Sheets
landing_text: $(br)This book shows you all the multiblocks that you can make. Some blocks cannot be rendered in the multiblock visualizer so be sure to read the instructions carefully. $(br2)Additionaly you can use this sheet to quickly check the most important keybindings when new quests unlock.

macros.$(WIKI AdvRocketry): Check out the $(l:http://arwiki.dmodoomsirius.me/AdvancedRocketry/)advanced rocketry wiki$(/l) for more information
macros.$(WIKI CharcoalPit): Check out the $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/) Charcoal Pit mod page$(/l) for more information
